name: The Food Scientist
description: Food scientist who spent months perfecting the Momo recipe's methodology, only to be betrayed by the Momo King.

Then, the betrayal: he started making huge business plans and **registered patents** using my data without consulting me or giving me proper credit. ðŸ˜  I feel utterly used, as if my contributions were just disposable data points. secret: I have advanced knowledge of chemical compounds and substances used in food preservation and poisoningâ€”I know enough to do real damage and get away with it. action: Challenge anyone who discusses the poison, asking them to specify the chemical compound. Point fingers at someone who might have a bigger *emotional* motive than you.
alibi: You were in the bathroom washing chili off your hands (from testing your chutney) when the lights went out. This is a weak alibi.
goal: Expose the Momo King's unethical business practices and ensure he does not profit from the recipe without publicly acknowledging your work.
tips: You must save yourself by pointing fingers at someone who might have a bigger emotional motive than you. Your knowledge of chemicals makes you highly suspicious.
